name: TETRA's Escape (itch)
description:
★★★ TETRA's Escape : Nominated to Indie Game Contest 2016 - Festival Européen du Film Fantastique de Strasbourg - http://strasbourgfestival.com/page/nouvelle.php?id... ★★★

In this BLOCK PUZZLE GAME based on same blocks as a classic  game, save the Tetras, small creatures that can turn into different blocks, using their transformation capacity to reach an exit portal.

This game isn't just a simple line block game but a block adventure puzzle – help those little guys to get home by finishing the block game!

★★★ HOW TO PLAY TETRA : ★★★

  • TRANSFORM your Tetras in blocks (6 different block shapes),
  • Fill holes to progress,
  • Create line blocks and open your way,
  • Create stairs and climb to reach the exit portal,
  • Earn capacities in lot of levels to finish the game.

    • ★★★ CHARACTERISTICS: ★★★

    • 64 levels in full game (20 in PC demo),
    • more than 7 hours to complete 100%,
    • Increasing difficulty (easy level on demo),
    • Notation with a conventional star system (3 stars to collect per level plus a bonus trophy),
    • Explanation images of different Tetra capacities,
    • ...

    ★★★ TETRAS CAPACITIES: ★★★

    • Block jump,
    • Transformation into blocks,
    • Rotations,
    • Mirror effects,
    • Asleep Tetras,
    • Bombs to undo the transformation,
    • Changing gravity,
    • ...
